alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker; Wise; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 8:50PM CDT until August 09 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Young County in north central Texas... Southwestern Wise County in north central Texas... Southern Jack County in north central Texas... Northwestern Parker County in north central Texas... Northeastern Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 849 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Jacksboro to Graham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Graham, Jacksboro, Graford, Bryson, Fort Richardson State Park, Lake Graham, Lake Bridgeport, Runaway Bay, Perrin, Salesville, Whitt, Lost Creek Reservoir, Cottondale, Gibtown, Balsora, Joplin, Bartons Chapel, Boonsville, Wizard Wells, and Vineyard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker; Wise; Young
